meanings.definition: A small spinning top with a pointed stem, used in gambling games.
meanings.sent1: The children gathered around to watch the teetotum spin.
meanings.sent2: He spun the teetotum and waited for it to stop.
meanings.sent3: The teetotum seemed to have a mind of its own, spinning faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a teetotum, spinning out of control with no clear direction.
meanings.sent5: The teetotum whirled around, mesmerizing everyone with its movement.

meanings.sent1: She teetotumed around the room, making everyone dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The dancer teetotumed gracefully on the stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to teetotum in circles chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: His head started to teetotum with all the new information.
meanings.sent5: The leaves teetotumed down from the tree, swirling in the wind.

meanings.definition: A game played with a teetotum.
meanings.sent1: The teetotum game was a favorite pastime in the village.
meanings.sent2: They gathered around to play the teetotum game together.
meanings.sent3: In the teetotum game, luck was the key to winning.
meanings.sent4: The teetotum game brought laughter and excitement to the group.
meanings.sent5: Playing the teetotum game brought back memories of childhood fun.
